summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5748 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, Denny's Addition to Ballard and Seattle, being the alley between West 50th Street and West 49th Street from 3rd Avenue Northwest to 6th Avenue Northwest; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75834, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
